001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.core;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.util.Resources;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLMapper;
007import jakarta.inject.Inject;
008import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
009import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
010import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.ConfigurationSource;
011import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.Configurator;
012import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.yaml.YamlConfiguration;
013import org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.LoggerContext;
014import org.glassfish.hk2.api.Factory;
015import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
016
017import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
018import java.io.IOException;
019import java.net.URL;
020import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
021
022@Service(name = "log4j2", metadata = "enabled=log4j2")
023public class LoggerContextFactory
024        implements Factory<LoggerContext> {
025
026    public static LoggerContext initialize(Configuration configuration) {
027        try {
028            final LoggerContext loggerContext;
029            String yaml = new YAMLMapper().writeValueAsString(configuration.getConfiguration("log4j2").json());
030            byte[] log4j2YamlConfig = yaml.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
031            URL baseConfigUrl = Resources.getResource("META-INF/xorcery-defaults.yaml").orElseThrow();
032            ConfigurationSource configurationSource = new ConfigurationSource(new ByteArrayInputStream(log4j2YamlConfig), baseConfigUrl);
033
034            // Reconfigure or initialize as appropriate
035            if (LogManager.getFactory().hasContext(Configurator.class.getName(), LoggerContextFactory.class.getClassLoader(), false)) {
036                org.apache.logging.log4j.core.LoggerContext context = (org.apache.logging.log4j.core.LoggerContext) LogManager.getContext(LoggerContextFactory.class.getClassLoader(), false);
037                Configurator.reconfigure(new YamlConfiguration(context, configurationSource));
038                loggerContext = context;
039            } else {
040                loggerContext = Configurator.initialize(null, configurationSource, null);
041            }
042            return loggerContext;
043        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
044            throw new RuntimeException(e);
045        }
046    }
047
048    private final LoggerContext loggerContext;
049
050    @Inject
051    public LoggerContextFactory(Configuration configuration) throws IOException {
052        if (configuration.getFalsy("log4j2").orElse(false)) {
053            loggerContext = initialize(configuration);
054        } else {
055            loggerContext = LogManager.getContext(Xorcery.class.getClassLoader(), false);
056        }
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    @Singleton
061    public LoggerContext provide() {
062        return loggerContext;
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    public void dispose(LoggerContext instance) {
067    }
068}
